0.eng:
PERLU KALYANTA
SO SAPA SI VIRUS CORONA
0.tom:
UN TOTOZ KATA'UANTA
TUMORO U VIRUS CORONA

4.eng: Waya esa en perlu kalya’an you kénsya en virus Corona

12.eng: Virus lemawé so kareputan ni lua’ anio’

13.eng: Sia’am tatawi.  Co aman ca kareputan lua’ so masére antara 2 m.

17.eng: Ané, so ko semeré tou masekol/masait/sumakit,co rona:

18.eng:
Wé’an masker sélya.
Ané sélya rona semait/semekol an nuntep maskerna, sityu karun ca lemawé asé tou-tou antawina.

22.eng:
Semangkum si tou anyo’ ca semakit.
Sia waya temaruy nowa’kena.

23.eng: Tou si kinyalawéan nem, semanggkum ca temuru’ myendam, ta’an tetap sakitna lemawé

24.eng: Pakasaan, loor tarén siya’am ma kumpul, éh ca kalyan you so séy-séy sé syémakit.

38.eng: Ta’an  ma’an kéna, semangkum lua’tou sumakit leméngkét an…

42.eng: So ca sengaja kinyatuliannu pakakas tyu, oh sontongngennu en namonu nesa,

43.eng: Waya esa en cara rona myusér virus, muas kama maké sabong, pyakelo’, ato alkohol.

44.eng: Virus rona temang makad 24 jam an dior esa pakakas,

48.eng: Muas kama maké sabong makad ambi’

52.eng: Kélé kemantar lagu “ Happy Birthday” maka rua waréngen.

57.eng: Kénsya cara muas kama makaa’d wersi?

58.eng: So katulian, siam ményéndé’. Pedioren muas kama maké sabong.

59.eng: Sia’am ka tulian an bagéan kesot i masker.

61.eng: *Bakteri rona mamuali keli an nuntep masker so talosem uré pinaké.

62.eng: Wangkillem en masker so karasaannu kotorem. Siam pakén en masker lébé asi esa ngando!

68.eng: Siam pakén mebali-wali pakanen, pakakas pakanan, palepan, o handuk.

69.eng: Co carona tulyinu en namo maké sikunu nesa, epe’ kadén

70.eng: So rona, muka’an ato pyalen papalen maké siku ato tongka’.

74.eng: Mento’ toyo’ uasen en kamanu maké sabong…

77.eng: Taruyan en nowa’ sityu ca saki’tan!

78.eng: Wacan pakasa sisinou tarépé an natas!

79.eng: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

80.eng: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)

81.eng: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020

83.eng:
A yawes cua: émaan pencegahan an komik anio’ sinyo’ paling gampang cemega sakit ma lawé pakasa walina, kélé, flu dan pilek, o musti éma’an se susud nendo, o ma’an cawana waba.
Referensi: Nunuwu’ an komik anio’ nyéma’ kumi’it ke’ an COVID 19 aka’d 28 Februari 2020, o kelian nindyo an telu referensi anio’.                                                                                                                                   https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html                                      https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/                                       https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Iyawes Cua: Komik an bentu PDF rona ndyon ambi’:                                                                          https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
En Pedoman Semerar Komik. Komik anio’ rona wyagé  ca wéran an media daring,ato an Whattspp o an Telegram, o rona ndyon ca wéran o cetaken an poster peken nesa ato éma’an paajaren am balé, sekolah o an tampa pa tawoyan. 
So magé si komik anio’, taneyan nangé en telu  a patik ambawa’ anyo’:     ﻿1)  Sia’am roban  en gambar komik anio’ é wyage pé.﻿2)  Komik anio’ catoro pya bangkér.﻿3) So wyagé an media social FB, tyulis kredit si myéma’wo cua @weimankowart, wyagé IG @weimankow (IG), ato tyulis kredit si myéma’wo cua instagram.com/weimankow﻿So maké walinya, rangaten sinyo’: comicsforgood@gmail.com

84.eng:
PERLU KALYANTA
SO SAPA SI VIRUS CORONA

Sia’m sawelan teks materi anio’, ta’an co rona semaléng, ato indyon an kélé sapaké’, o wyagé an bentuk walina, o siam pawangkér. O tyulis si myéma’ anio’ o tulis si penulis o si jemambar komik anio’ Weiman Kou.

An versi Bahasa Inggris, nyéma’ I Paul Frank

bookText.eng:
PERLU KALYANTA
SO SAPA SI VIRUS CORONA

TONTEMBOAN MAKÉLA'I

Waya esa en perlu kalya’an you kénsya en virus Corona
MALAWÉ
Semu’d
Ngilung
Welen
Muntep an nuntep
Tou  nyaman
Tou semakit
Virus lemawé so kareputan ni lua’ anio’
Sia’am tatawi.  Co aman ca kareputan lua’ so masére antara 2 m.
1
0,5m - 2m
Haaachii!!
Ané, so ko semeré tou masekol/masait/sumakit,co rona:
Wé’an masker sélya.
Ané sélya rona semait/semekol an nuntep maskerna, sityu karun ca lemawé asé tou-tou antawina.
2
Makapulu’sama’ “SROOT”
Ato,
Semangkum si tou anyo’ ca semakit.
Sia waya temaruy nowa’kena.
Tou si kinyalawéan nem, semanggkum ca temuru’ myendam, ta’an tetap sakitna lemawé
Pakasaan, loor tarén siya’am ma kumpul, éh ca kalyan you so séy-séy sé syémakit.
Pakakas pakanan
Tou nyaman
Patemboyan kereta
Kenop lift
Tisu
Paleppan
Eletronik
Wo an bagean luar masker
Patemboyan tangga
Mous
Polpén
Kenop papalen
Kama é lya
Ta’an  ma’an kéna, semangkum lua’tou sumakit leméngkét an…
Camo waya semangkum semakit
Ato namo tou-tou an tawinu,
Mapisyi mbelen
So ca sengaja kinyatuliannu pakakas tyu, oh sontongngennu en namonu nesa,
Waya esa en cara rona myusér virus, muas kama maké sabong, pyakelo’, ato alkohol.
Virus rona temang makad 24 jam an dior esa pakakas,
Sabong
Éma’an cegan kélé sinyo’
Ané tyu, loor kii’ten
Muas kama maké sabong makad ambi’
Sabong
Siku kama
Siaa’m syontong namonu
(ato namo sey)
Kélé kemantar lagu “ Happy Birthday” maka rua waréngen.
An bawa’ sulu
Sangapulu’ o rua detik
An pabu’un popondol
Uwasan an somoy kama
Kénsya cara muas kama makaa’d wersi?
So katulian, siam ményéndé’. Pedioren muas kama maké sabong.
Sia’am ka tulian an bagéan kesot i masker.
Pentakan lua’
*Bakteri rona mamuali keli an nuntep masker so talosem uré pinaké.
Wangkillem en masker so karasaannu kotorem. Siam pakén en masker lébé asi esa ngando!
Pakén lépér sayor
Toyang
Amang
Inang
Pakén handuk mengesa-esa.
Siam pakén mebali-wali pakanen, pakakas pakanan, palepan, o handuk.
Co carona tulyinu en namo maké sikunu nesa, epe’ kadén
So rona, muka’an ato pyalen papalen maké siku ato tongka’.
Walé
Maka waréngé' an balé pinyontaran
So keman nem
Mento’ toyo’ uasen en kamanu maké sabong…
Kasampetan,
Sabong
Taruyan en nowa’ sityu ca saki’tan!
Wacan pakasa sisinou tarépé an natas!
"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
"How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020
Referensi  kataré informasi kesehatan:
A yawes cua: émaan pencegahan an komik anio’ sinyo’ paling gampang cemega sakit ma lawé pakasa walina, kélé, flu dan pilek, o musti éma’an se susud nendo, o ma’an cawana waba.
Referensi: Nunuwu’ an komik anio’ nyéma’ kumi’it ke’ an COVID 19 aka’d 28 Februari 2020, o kelian nindyo an telu referensi anio’.                                                                                                                                   https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html                                      https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/                                       https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Iyawes Cua: Komik an bentu PDF rona ndyon ambi’:                                                                          https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
En Pedoman Semerar Komik. Komik anio’ rona wyagé  ca wéran an media daring,ato an Whattspp o an Telegram, o rona ndyon ca wéran o cetaken an poster peken nesa ato éma’an paajaren am balé, sekolah o an tampa pa tawoyan. 
So magé si komik anio’, taneyan nangé en telu  a patik ambawa’ anyo’:     ﻿1)  Sia’am roban  en gambar komik anio’ é wyage pé.﻿2)  Komik anio’ catoro pya bangkér.﻿3) So wyagé an media social FB, tyulis kredit si myéma’wo cua @weimankowart, wyagé IG @weimankow (IG), ato tyulis kredit si myéma’wo cua instagram.com/weimankow﻿So maké walinya, rangaten sinyo’: comicsforgood@gmail.com
